author: Joseph Young
title: U.S. Futures Crushed as California Records Million Unemployment Claims
description: The U.S. stock market is set to decline by around 1.8% as investors anticipate the unemployment rate of the country to spike further. The post U.S. Futures Crushed as California Records Million Unemployment Claims appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• The U.S. stock market is set for a 1.8% drop at market opening as investors fear for high jobless claims.
  • California alone has seen more than 1 million unemployed individuals since early March.
